definitions.definition: ( orthography , printing ) A semicircular diacritical mark ( ˘ ) placed above a vowel , commonly used to mark its quantity as short.
( music ) A double whole note ; a note twice as long as a semibreve .
( law ) Any writ or precept under seal , issued out of any court.
( zoology ) A pitta , all of which have more or less short tails.

main_definition: ( orthography , printing ) A semicircular diacritical mark ( ˘ ) placed above a vowel , commonly used to mark its quantity as short.
secondary_definitions: ( music ) A double whole note ; a note twice as long as a semibreve .
( law ) Any writ or precept under seal , issued out of any court.
( zoology ) A pitta , all of which have more or less short tails.

definitions.definition: An equal mix of espresso and half and half cream.

main_definition: An equal mix of espresso and half and half cream.
